update db_functionconfig
'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPBASECODE = #{spbasecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOPER = #{creatoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FUNCTIONID = #{functionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATTIME = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
